name: BeatSaver Tags - Dark, compact
description: My crusade against whitespace continues! BST is a great tool for players. This style makes it more large monitor friendly. Updated to account for site changes and now has a sister style: BeatSaver Tags - Dark, compact, list
additional_info:
v1.1 - 2018-09-20 - Updated for new site design.
v1.0 - 2018-08-06 - Initial release
